website_summaries.verdict: This tub offers a lot of tub for a lower-than-expected price.
pros: At 40 inches wide, this tub is even bigger than you will expect
Comes with legs that anchor to the floor for stability
Works great for laundry tub, but can also hold a lot of cleaning supplies like buckets and mops
A great tub for bathing dogs
cons: The tub does not have a hole for the faucet installation, so you will have to cut your own

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!!
customer_reviews.text: We've lived in our house for 20 years and never had a sink in the basement. We do now!! It's in our laundry area and I absolutely love it! I bought a great faucet to go with it and now all those things that I used to have to wash in the bathtub, I can now scrub away standing at my new sink.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Chritz

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a doggy tub for a 50LB Puggle with ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a doggy tub for a 50LB Puggle with much room to spare. No more breaking my back bending over a bath tub!
customer_reviews.author: -D

customer_reviews.title: This was very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to install. It seems sturdy and works well as a laundry tub. As directed I did secure the front legs to the floor with anchor bolts. This unit is so light it moves around even when connected to the drain so the bolts solved this issue. Be aware that this is not the combo kit that includes the faucet and p-trap hardware. I was under the assumption that this was the combo kit that I found elsewhere on line at some home improvement stores. You will need to purchase a faucet for this tub as well as drain parts.
customer_reviews.author: irishlad

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Legs, Prone to Staining, but Otherwise OK
customer_reviews.text: The legs are a little weak for the unit and it would be nice if they attached to the bottom by some other method than friction. I had to screw the adjustment feet into a base. I suppose this is how it is supposed to be used, but it would be nice if it was designed better. The plastic is prone to staining. After a wash of some sooty containers, every scratch in the plastic, which it came with from the factory, is now a nice black color, and there are other black stains throughout. It's OK for my application, but the quality just seems a bit cheap for the dollars spent.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: This tub is awesome. Bought for my garage so I could clean ...
customer_reviews.text: This tub is awesome. Bought for my garage so I could clean huge items like BBQ grates and have plenty of room for cleaning paint brushes and auto parts and such. This is basically double the normal tub. I love it and wish I had bought it sooner. Be sure to anchor to the floor which makes it way studier feeling. Not really much to look at...I mean its a laundry tub, but great utility tub when matched with a quality faucet esp one with a hose!
customer_reviews.author: WarmSunSA

customer_reviews.title: Great tub, weak legs
customer_reviews.text: First, there's no hole for the faucet. (Allowing you to cut your own or not.) Second, an area for soap or bottles. Its made strong, all for the legs. I placed the tub out to catch some rainwater, from the gutter. Come morning, the legs had twisted and bent. Not a concern, as you can place the tub on the ground or drive. The rubber stopper works, I just slipped a solid rubber washer in the bottom to seal the plug. Overall, its a solid, large and well built tub. All for the legs, those are trash!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to bath my dogs in our basement. I have two husky and golden retriever mix dogs, one who is 72 pounds and one who is 90 pounds. They both fit in easily. To get them in I have a pair of pet grooming stairs I also purchased on Amazon. You do need to make sure you purchase a faucet with a removable wand, that reaches far enough to get their belly/butt/etc.
customer_reviews.author: Karli

customer_reviews.title: Nice sized tub but support legs are poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: This tub is nice but has one fatal flaw. The design of the legs is such that you wedge them into place with a hammer. But it doesn't hold. I did this 3 times, each time I banged harder than the previous. The tub actually fell down twice. There is nothing attached, just press fit. Finally I got my drill out and put some holes with screws and washers, 2 on each leg and through the tub. This worked great, now it's stable. They need a new design otherwise great laundry tub.
customer_reviews.author: R. Harlow

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my best purchases ever
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my best purchases ever! I own 10 dogs. My single basin utility tub is not large enough to fit my dogs in. I set this up in my basement near my walk out. I put it close to water connections. I bought a hand held shower unit so we have the almost perfect set up. This makes bathing the fur beasts so much easier. This is plenty big enough. I am tall so I set it up on concrete blocks to eliminate having to bend.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Harding

customer_reviews.title: I use this without the legs as a makeshift bathtub ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this without the legs as a makeshift bathtub for my kids 2 and 4yrs. It has a wide ledge for their toys and fits under the faucet well.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this huge utility tub
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a utility tub for washing various paint trays, brushes, and other misc., but when I found this one, I realized it will also make an excellent dog bath. I have a small collie 40-50# and got a faucet with the retractable hose - voila, no more using the house bathtub or shower, and I don't need to take her to a do it yourself wash either!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Colvin

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the purchase. Log neck faucet not recommended, as the upper is is a bit flimsy. I had to makeshift a block the fits underneath for extra support. I might try to fix this to the wall some how. There is no way of attaching this sink to the wall. Standard connection at the bottom, you'll have to drill the faucet hole. Great tub seem strong enough for some heavy lifting. Metrial mares pretty easily, but tough to see over all if there is a scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Howard

customer_reviews.title: Makes dog's bathtime easy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this utility tub for my 25-pound terrier dog to use for bathing him. It is an excellent tub constructed of solid plastic. It has a unibody construction so there's no leaks and it is big enough so that my dog can move around and it makes it very easy for bathing him. The legs do not seem to wobble at all, although I don't fill the whole tub with water and instead use an extension/hose faucet. It was definitely worth the upgrade over the smaller utility sinks and I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: koen

customer_reviews.title: Light-weight but sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Light-weight but sturdy. Easy to assemble and install. Quite affordable.Be aware that depending on your plumbing you may also need to buy (as I did) a laundry tub mounting block for the faucets The block you can get inexpensively as an "add-on" item from Amazon..
customer_reviews.author: Ken W

customer_reviews.title: Good tub, crappy legs
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok but the legs are not great. In fact, they can pop off when you move the empty tub. They are made of plastic (too thin imo) and just slide into slots (with a mallet and much frustration). My roommate built a base to permanently attach the legs (maybe that’s why there are predrilled holes in the feet). The tub itself is good and the plug fits nicely. We use it as an outdoor dog wash tub with a hose.
customer_reviews.author: VM SD

customer_reviews.title: I like it but where the faucet goes is pretty flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my garage. I like it but where the faucet goes is pretty flimsy. I may have to try to reinforce it with wood under that area, if possible. I love the size, especially for bathing my dog. I also had the four legs fastened to my concrete floor to make it sturdy. If not for the soft and flimsy area for the faucet I would have rated it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: great tub for bathing dogs
customer_reviews.text: this is a great tub. It's hard to find one without the center divider. I wanted one without the divider so I could bathe my dogs. I have 235 pound beagles and this thing works great. It's much easier on my back not having to bend over the bathtub to bathe them. Easy to put together and seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S

customer_reviews.title: Well built and sturdy yet light enough to move around
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a large sink to keep outside during summer and move to basement during winter months. The size is just what I was looking for. Well built and sturdy yet light enough to move around. For me it was a plus that it had no holes drilled for faucet and and the ledge where I keep a sponge and soap dispenser sits lower and is not flush at the top. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Strong, beautiful, and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This tub exceeded my expectations. Solid, easy to clean, and all corners actually drain! The leveling feet work properly and the bottom foot is strong plastic. This avoids rust at floor level. I screwed mine to the floor and silicone caulked the back lip to the backsplash. I am very pleased with the quality of this tub.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Mustee tub I have installed. The first was the single 20 inch wide model that eventually proved to small for our needs. Initially just needed a hand wash sink but my wife decided to use it for washing our small dog, which worked but we just rescued a slightly larger dog that would not feel comfortable in that small sink. Now all is well! This is a high quality tub and fairly easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Tom J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and height for washing big dogs and big items.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a bigger tub to wash our 60lb dog and this tub is the perfect size and height for that. Inserting the legs into the tub was a challenge because they would just bounce out as we tried pounding them in. We used a grinder to shave the legs down on each side ever so slightly and they were a perfect fit after that. We also added a pop rivet to each leg to provide extra sturdiness and bolted legs to floor. Overall this tub is very nice, sturdy and makes washing big items so much easier. Wish we would have bought this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: nice and large. very sturdy. installed feet to concrete slab with Tapcon screws...worked out well. nice wide surface to fit faucet and sprayed--simply drill holes and install. nice recessed pocket for soap/sponge. uneventful connection to standard 1 1/2" plumbing. really really pleased.
customer_reviews.author: TobycW

customer_reviews.title: Size matters
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Appears sturdy and nice size. Good height. Little pricy for a plastic tub. Unfortunately you have to drill for faucet. I decided to mount faucet on wall over sink. More. versatile
customer_reviews.author: jeffry t.

customer_reviews.title: ... can bathe my 65 lb dog in it just great! I LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace the littler one and now I can bathe my 65 lb dog in it just great! I LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.author: Devan

customer_reviews.title: Good, but there is room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: The quality is allright. Other reviewers have already pointed out that the legs are flimsy. However, when one mounts the legs to the floor, it's sturdy enough. I wished that they had braced the lip where one mounts the faucet. I mounted a faucet with a spray had and the lip flops back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Markus Girstmair

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sink!
customer_reviews.text: Wife is envy that I have this sink in my basement brewery area. Is so big it makes very easy to clean kegs and big kettles and pots. I think all home sinks should be this size. Super easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice tub, legs not very high quality. would give it 5 stars if legs were a bit more sturdy
customer_reviews.author: BubDonna

customer_reviews.title: Well made and nicely priced.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful size and quality. Didn’t realize the benefits of a large tub until I got this one. Well made, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Chudwick

customer_reviews.title: Great tub sink if you have the space
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about this big tub sink. I bought it for home-brewing (beer) but it gets used for washing the dog, cleaning garden tools and shoes and drying the mop. Outstanding size and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tony W

customer_reviews.title: I like this unit a lot better than the split sink ...
customer_reviews.text: Using for bathing medium size dog. I like this unit a lot better than the split sink made by the same company. Although the legs are somewhat cheap you can always brace it if you don't like it
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: and I love how big and easy to clean it is
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my basement pottery studio, and I love how big and easy to clean it is! My wheel splash pan and buckets fit with extra room. I was considering going stainless steel, but I’m glad I went with this one. More economical and it’s not noisy when my tools hit the bottom of it.
customer_reviews.author: Andréanne

customer_reviews.title: so much better than having a divider
customer_reviews.text: Could not find this locally....so much better than having a divider. Treat yourself right and get a kitchen faucet to go with a handle that pulls out with sprayer. You will be gold!
customer_reviews.author: JOHNNY RINGO

customer_reviews.title: garage tub
customer_reviews.text: Fits great in our garage and the size is perfect for washing larger items.
customer_reviews.author: her1212

customer_reviews.title: The biggest tub ever!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sink. Its HUGE!!!! I removed one star because the legs are a little flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Potamus

customer_reviews.title: This tub is absolutely huge and perfect for our application in the shop
customer_reviews.text: This tub is absolutely huge and perfect for our application in the shop. It seems very durable, easy to clean, easy to keep clean and yet it looks sharp. I would recommend this if you want a large sized tub at a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Elbert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for giving my dogs (each about 50 lbs.) a bath.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Bagodonuts

customer_reviews.title: For the price this tub is perfect. I put this in my garage to help ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price this tub is perfect. I put this in my garage to help with cleanup to help keep dirt outside of my house. I could almost bath in it it is so big.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Spangler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sixe for my large shop are
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sixe for my large shop are. We process our own deer and make our own sausage so clean up is a breeze with this larger sink. Cutting boards, stuffers, grinders, etc...all fit for clean up. Clean up is nice and a little bleach keeps the germs away!
customer_reviews.author: DGR

customer_reviews.title: Very nice utility tub.
customer_reviews.text: This tub is going to be perfect for washing my dogs. Excellent customer service from the manufacturer as well.
customer_reviews.author: T. DELISLE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: You can put a big dog in this thing. Paint brushes, rollers, edger.. Whatever.. its a breeze.. Love this thing.. make sure is perfectly level and your good.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Great utility sink.
customer_reviews.text: Great sink- use in the garage and got this size to be able to give our 20# dogs a bath. The only problem is that the "floor" is very flat. I would like it to be just a bit more angled, but don't regret this purchase at all.
customer_reviews.author: IDHiker

customer_reviews.title: Nice tub with one minor issue.
customer_reviews.text: A nice tub but could use a bit more drop in the drain area. Water does tend to sit in the tub, though not a large amount. I'd be happy not to see any.
customer_reviews.author: FrankP

customer_reviews.title: This oversized tub installed nicely and is perfect for our mechanical room
customer_reviews.text: This oversized tub installed nicely and is perfect for our mechanical room. The price is very reasonable and as usual Amazon's fulfillment services are brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Water Lover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice BIG laundry tray. Very sturdy on its legs which lock into the basin very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Stturdy, big enough and working as advertized
customer_reviews.text: Stturdy, big enough and apropreately not too heavy. I could carry by myself to the basement. Need to make a hole to install a faucet. My plumber used a hole saw to open it up without problem. It was installed with a kitchen faucet with shower head and working as advertized.
customer_reviews.author: rkv

customer_reviews.title: Good Utility Tub
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace our old concrete double-tub from the 1950s, which was cracked, and worn out. Got the plumber to install it. Works great. Got the CleanFLO 8811 faucet that were supposedly "frequently bought together." Also good. We wanted a bigger utility tub, and this one fills the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Jordine

customer_reviews.title: The BIG basin!
customer_reviews.text: Less common size, but exactly meets needs for large basin. Well-made, easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Rustypipe

customer_reviews.title: Seems good
customer_reviews.text: We're having a hard time getting a plumber to install but overall good piece, perfect for bathing our dog (why we bought it)
customer_reviews.author: Niki C.

customer_reviews.title: Great tub at a much better price than I could find elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: Feels very sturdy with thick plastic. I love the size. I can hose down rugs, wash a 35# dog, dump shopvacs of water, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Seipel

customer_reviews.title: Best buy
customer_reviews.text: My fur babies love this tub! Fits my rotty just perfect
customer_reviews.author: Lucille Serna

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is very serviceable and does the job. I will say it is a little flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for dog bathing
customer_reviews.text: Really like this tub for bathing our toy size dogs. It is a good height and installation was very straight forward. Recommend you spend a few extra $$ on the faucet - get a good one(commercial grade is best). We bought the Moen model 8277.
customer_reviews.author: Geeman

customer_reviews.title: Working like a charm
customer_reviews.text: purchased to make a wash station for our pooches.... Working like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: prestonmcc

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: This tub is much better than I expected for the money. My husband reinforced the legs just in case, with wood. Now we have the perfect place to wash the dogs and take care of other cleaning tasks!
customer_reviews.author: Nick and Sasha's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great solid wash tube.
customer_reviews.text: We use this to wash or two dogs. Works great for that reason. I think it will last a long time. Solid item
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: At 40" wide it's twice as wide as what I replaced. Well build one piece molded construction, easy to assemble legs, built in recessed shelf drains to tub-nice for sponges, etc. Makes washing large items simple. Professionally installed-very happy.
customer_reviews.author: John G

customer_reviews.title: Home brewers need this
customer_reviews.text: Installed for my home brewery. Better than stainless steel as it won't bang up my kegs. Big enough to wash my 20 gallon pots and 15 gallon fermenters. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: paul2earth

customer_reviews.title: Plenty sturdy and stable
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for to replace the standard-sized tub in my shop. Plenty sturdy and stable. I have filled it to near the top while sanitizing my beer bottles and it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Big Al

customer_reviews.title: Easier to wash my beagle
customer_reviews.text: Got this larger size tub sink for washing my beagle. Liking the large sink.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne T Mills

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I need in my garage to wash medium and small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Fender

customer_reviews.title: Nice Big Tub For Magot
customer_reviews.text: Like it much. Just the right size. A bit weak in the legs but easily corrected by adding screws.
customer_reviews.author: rmharrington

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice tub, though the back shelf is slightly deformed and not even, probably from storage.
customer_reviews.author: G. Farney

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This tub is perfect for washing medium to large dogs.
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Large Sized Laundry Tub!
customer_reviews.text: Had this sink installed by my plumber 3 months ago. It's a great size for giving my medium sized dog a bath. Am very happy that I purchased this item after doing quite a bit of research. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Bateman

customer_reviews.title: Great bathtub for small kids
customer_reviews.text: We bought a house that didn’t have a bathtub. We bought this specifically to use as a tub for my two small children! We love it. It works perfectly for this purpose!
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdier than other reviews made it sound, although ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdier than other reviews made it sound, although I have not tried washing a dog in it yet. The question I have is how do they get a large dog in the tub? I have not had it plumbed up yet, but it meets and maybe exceeds my expectations for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Papa M.

customer_reviews.title: Legs useless
customer_reviews.text: Legs do not bouther sending them about killed me and my dog. Tub is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Strehle

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love it ---- Wish I had bought it years ago
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this tub to bathe my dogs !! Absolutely Love it ---- Wish I had bought it years ago !
customer_reviews.author: Jim Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Good be a little heavier or thicker but it works and I like the size. I would have preferred stainless steel but I am too much of a cheapskate.
customer_reviews.author: Sandan

customer_reviews.title: This tub is much smaller then it looks. Its ...
customer_reviews.text: This tub is much smaller then it looks. Its also very shallow. This hole tub is so light in weight I could throw it a crossed the room with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Utility Tub
customer_reviews.text: This is a great utility tub. Meets my needs. I do not have to wash pots on the ground anymore when having a cookout in the backyard. Sturdy tub. Bolted it to the ground and added screws to each of the metal legs so that it stays firmly connected.
customer_reviews.author: Ashmeed Hossain

customer_reviews.title: Worth all 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Attached the back legs to the basement floor and ran a bead of silicon along the back edge and the wall, and this tub is solid. There are no leaks, scuffs, or other blemishes. I highly recommend if you want an above average sized utility tub.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice unit but there is no way to attach it to the wall. It looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R. Asin

customer_reviews.title: The puppy doesn't love the tub so much though
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this tub... put it in the laundry room & now her puppy gets weekly baths.. The puppy doesn't love the tub so much though ...
customer_reviews.author: Boe Bauman

customer_reviews.title: The best sink in my house because of the size!
customer_reviews.text: The best sink in my house. I can clean fish without hitting the sides, give your dog a wash, and even stick a big ice chest in there to clean it!! I recommend a pull down sprayer if you buy this!!
customer_reviews.author: DY

customer_reviews.title: great utility sink
customer_reviews.text: great utility sink; sturdy when the legs are bolted down as recommended; big enough to bath a medium size dog
customer_reviews.author: Paul Brule

customer_reviews.title: Very large quailty tub.
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted a larger tub in our mechanical room for washing out many of my "hubby projects". But this thing is HUGE! I've purchased several utility tubs from this manufacture before for my woodworking shop, and I already knew the quality was there. This tub is no different. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Woodshop Man

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Look is what I expected but installation is on hold. Not ready to install.
customer_reviews.author: Danno

customer_reviews.title: Great for dog baths!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tub! Perfect for dog baths and general home use. Well made, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice tub. The only thing that I would have ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice tub. The only thing that I would have liked to see would be a slightly better slope of the tub bottom towards the drain. Other than that it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kipina

customer_reviews.title: Dogs
customer_reviews.text: this is great for the garage and washing both dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Poisson

customer_reviews.title: Great sink can fit a 5 gallon bucket in it
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for. Fast shipping. Great sink can fit a 5 gallon bucket in it.
customer_reviews.author: James Ragsdale

customer_reviews.title: Great Pet Tub
customer_reviews.text: Nice large tub works great for bathing pets and so much easier than standard size. Should have bought one years ago!
customer_reviews.author: D in Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Tub came without all of it's parts!
customer_reviews.text: Sink came with no legs or stopper in the box!!! Had to call Mustee about the missing items and they are sending them in a "week or ten days! Very disappointed! Amazon delivered the product in a few days now I have to wait another week or so for the legs! Not happy about it as I wanted to install the tub this weekend! I will not buy anymore Mustee products due to this problem that should not have happened along with the slow replacement of the parts from Mustee!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Ham

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: It was just the perfect addition for my brewery. now I can wash all my equipment without making a big mess.
customer_reviews.author: DKrice

customer_reviews.title: Light-weight body
customer_reviews.text: pro: perfect fit. great for washing large items that are easily lifted. It suits my needs perfectly. con: not for heavy items. lighter body than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping, just what I needed to give my dogs a bath
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Oldfield

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great solution for washing the dog. Nice construction, very sturdy tub.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth S.

customer_reviews.title: Like the size but see photos after every time of ...
customer_reviews.text: Like the size but see photos after every time of use the bottom is bowed out and dirt and grime will not drain have to clean it every time not what I signed up for the dirt doesn't even drain next to drain. It appears to have a uneven base so I don't see how it will ever drain. In summary I like size but I would never recommend this product to anyone until they fix this problem it could be a good sink
customer_reviews.author: Abby Tighe

customer_reviews.title: Love this sink!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sink! Exactly what I was looking for! Durable, lightweight and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Irmark

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I bought this large tub for cleanup when I'm making beer. Not much to say about a big plastic tub. It looks good. It's solidly built. It's easy to attach the legs. The only slightly irritating thing is that the legs seem to be stuck together in groups of two when the paint is not totally dry. When you separate the legs, some of them will have a noticeable blemish. Just select the unblemished legs to face the front of the tub. Seems like it wouldn't take a rocket scientist to figure out a better way to prevent the paint sticking together. But for function and overall appearance, it's what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Barry J Rueckert

customer_reviews.title: excellent upgrade in size & quality
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful Laundry Sink Upgrade The Muster Big ub is my mist prized item in my laundry room. The old standard size laundry sink didn't work for washing my dogs. Now with the Bigtub bathing them has never been easier. It is about double the size of your standard laundry sink. I checked my local hardware stores and couldn't find anything nearly close to the size of the Mustee Bigtub. If you have the space in your laundry room, then get one of these. You won't regret it. Awesome upgrade from standard size sink.
customer_reviews.author: Sexy Sonya

customer_reviews.title: It's a Laundry Sink - And It's Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I just love this thing. I already had a laundry sink in my basement, but it was much smaller. I wanted something I could wash just about anything in and this fit the bill. I installed it recently and, combined with a garden hose compatible faucet, I am thrilled. Cleaning the cat box, large parts, the furnace filters (reusable static), buckets, tubs - I could even give the dog a bath in this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey C Drywater

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Some people wrote that it didn't seem sturdy--seems good to may, and I bathe our dog in it....
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Its a nice big laundry tub
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice big laundry tub. It's not as sturdy as I thought it would be. I can push down firmly at the center of the tub and the bottom will move a little. In other words I wouldn't put too much weight in it. Otherwise it works fine as a discharge for the washing machine and cleaning bulky items, washing the dog, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Hammer Man

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size to wash my 70 lb labrador in
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to wash my 70 lb labrador in. Easy to set up, looks great, and made in The USA!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: For the price this is a great tub. I use it to give my Boxers ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a great tub. I use it to give my Boxers a bath. I show dogs and needed a tub my building that allows me to be up off of the floor and this works great. I did fasten it securely to the wall with two "L" brackets but I don't think you it would be necessary if you used it occasionally. It sure beats spending $800 or $900 for a metal one that will rust eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Besten Boxers

customer_reviews.title: great value.
customer_reviews.text: bought 2 one for the garage and one for the basement!! great value.. I would get a better faucet is all
customer_reviews.author: jscinta

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: This was a good choice. Sturdy and large. Makes it easy to was dog. Plummer installed with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Dogmom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and works well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and works well. Divots in the plastic make it easy to drill out holes for the faucet. Large size is great for homebrewing beer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Mustee 28F Bigtub Utilatub Laundry Tub Floor Mount, 24-Inch x 40-Inch, White
product_meta.description:
Size:1-(Pack)This is a muster floor-mount laundry tub in the color white. It is one piece molded tub of impact-resistance polypropylene, including heavy gauge steel legs with adjustable levelers . This laundry tub features a large, self-draining back shelf and a color-fast, stain-resistant white finish. Also features mold and mildew-resistant components. Easy to assemble and install.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This is a Mustee floor-mount laundry tub in the color white. It is one piece molded tub of impact-resistance polypropylene, including heavy gauge steel legs with adjustable levelers . This laundry tub features a large, self-draining back shelf and a color-fast, stain-resistant white finish. Also features mold and mildew-resistant components. Easy to assemble and install.

Large, self-draining back shelf directs water run-off into the tub
Mold and mildew-resistant components color-fast, stain-resistant white finish
